a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of children who are stunted vs. CO₂ emissions per capita, 2019
The share of children younger than five who are stunted – significantly shorter than the average for their age, as a
consequence of poor nutrition and/or repeated infection.
Share of children who are stunted
Source: UNICEF, World Health Organization and World Bank, Global Carbon Budget (2022); Gapminder (2022); UN (2022); HYDE (2017);
